role.argrole: thing arg0 has different views about

example.parse: (IP (NP-TMP (NT 现今)) (NP-SBJ (NN 朝野)) (VP (VP (PP-DIR (P 对) (NP (DNP (NP (NN 程序) (NN 瑕疵)) (DEG 之)) (NP (NN 补正)))) (ADVP (AD 已)) (VP (VE 有) (NP-OBJ (ADJP (JJ 一致)) (NP (NN 看法))))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 但)) (PP-DIR (P 对) (IP (LCP-TMP (NP (NN 报告)) (LC 前)) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 是否)) (VP (VV 应) (VP (VV 让) (NP-OBJ (NN 核四)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 复工)))))))) (PU ，) (ADVP (AD 仍)) (VP (VC 是) (VP (VV 各执一辞))))))
example.arg: 对 报告 前 *pro* 是否 应 让 核四 *PRO* 复工
